name: Fall Frontier
description:
This is my very first published game. Settle the long-time feud between these two neighboring seasons! You play as Autumn when the brutal winter begins to set in.  Use apple trees to supply you with valuable currency. Use that currency to make oak trees that attack the enemies, pumpkins that slow enemies down, or apple trees to get even more apples.  Give the defense all you've got and have fun!

                                                            J.M.J.T

Code and art made by Crazy Kitty Company (Sniperaxiom)

Music made by Conman Co. (Potato 'stache)

Special thanks to DaFluffyPotato for all the helpful pygame tutorials!
